homeproducts.product_title: Piano Waterfall Kitchen Sink (30 x 18 x 9 inches) with Pull-out Mixer Faucet & RO Tap
homeproducts.description:
External Product Dimensions: 1200mm x 75mm x 32mm
Material: Manufactured in AISI 304-Grade high-quality 1mm thick Stainless-Steel having 18% Chromium and 8% Nickel composition for non-corrosive and rust-resistant qualities.
Finish: Tile shower drains have a brushed matte finish that gives an invisible, unbroken, and luxurious appearance, making your bathroom décor aesthetically and naturally pleasing.
Package includes: Drain Cover, Tray, Cockroach Trap
